name: Is the Temple Within the Feld or Is the Field Within the Temple?
description:
ಬಯಲು ಆಲಯದೊಳಗೊ? ಆಲಯವು ಬಯಲೊಳಾಗೊ? - Is the temple within the field or is the field within the temple?
In the hyperconnected world that we live in, which has become more and more complex by the day, how do we see the multiple worlds (pluriverse) that we reside in? How do we conserve our cities by conserving different habitats? What are the short-sighted politics that come in the way of conservation? Do we need to find new meaning to the word Development?
Join Mahesh Bhat as he explores these questions in this lecture.

name: ‘Bangalorean’ : Reading and Public Lecture
description:
Bengaluru is a melting pot of cultures, people, traditions, professions and lifestyles. In a city so diverse which has undergone rapid changes within the recent decades - who are Bangaloreans?

Join Kaveri Sinhji as she explores the essence of Bengaluru as captured in the book ‘Bangalorean’. The book, being a product of countless interviews and hundreds of photographs, is a telling of the city’s dynamic social fabric through individual portraits and stories.
